solution_line_template: Roque takes {walk_to_work_time}*{walk_days} = <<{walk_to_work_time}*{walk_days}={walk_to_total}>>{walk_to_total} hours a week to walk to work.
Roque takes {walk_to_total}*2 = <<{walk_to_total}*2={walk_to_from_total}>>{walk_to_from_total} hours a week to walk to and from work.
Roque takes {bike_to_work_time}*{bike_days} = <<{bike_to_work_time}*{bike_days}={bike_to_total}>>{bike_to_total} hours a week to bike to work.
Roque takes {bike_to_total}*2 = <<{bike_to_total}*2={bike_to_from_total}>>{bike_to_from_total} hours a week to bike to and from work.
In total, Roque takes {walk_to_from_total}+{bike_to_from_total} = <<{walk_to_from_total}+{bike_to_from_total}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hour a week to go to and from work.
